explains: adj. 不切实际的；不实在的

sentences.en: The city has unrealistic pretensions to world-class status.
sentences.cn: 该城市不切实际地声称为世界一流城市。

sentences.en: It would be unrealistic to expect such a process ever to be completed.
sentences.cn: 期望完成这样一个过程是不现实的。

sentences.en: It is unrealistic to put undue pressure on ourselves by saying we are the best.
sentences.cn: 说我们是最好的来给我们自己施加过多的压力是不现实的。
